item.title: IIBM Networking 2021
item.description: The “IIBM Networking 2021” is an instance to know each others research and increase interdisciplinary colaborations. Will be held on December 14h virtually. Important dates Abstract/breakout/workshop submission deadline: December/14 Virtual event/stream: December/21
